title: Replay work branch refactor onto clean head
description: Apply the saved patch that captures commit 018d69a7ac77fd1b486bebd91262b49ce8460922 onto the resynced branch so the governance relocation and module split land without merge conflicts.

apply_instructions: Resolve any path updates introduced since the original commit (notably modules/, entities/, and yggdrasil.json).

acceptance_criteria: Patch applies cleanly or with documented manual resolutions.
All moved governance manifests reside under entities/ in the new branch.
modules/ replaces the previous library/ naming, including templates and audits.
notes: If further commits existed after 018d69a7a, capture additional patches and reference them here so the full history can be replayed.
Close this task once the new branch is opened as a PR replacing the retired work branch.
resolution_notes: Patch replayed via targeted commits; modules realigned and validation run.
